Afrokash Afrokash测试版 The best loan experience starts here, quick, easy, no hidden fee Enter Phone Number Please enter your mobile number Login/Register to Apply Please read all the <Privacy Policy> carefully. Register Dears 234 %s USSD SMS Enter verification code Set up a 6-digit password Enter password again Get Code Sign Up Re-send the \n code in %ss Log in Login Enter password Forgot password？ Reset Password Reset I agree to the <Privacy Policy>and <Terms and Conditions>
Sms Collect and monitor only financial transaction text messages including the name of the transaction party. The purpose is to conduct a credit risk assessment of the transaction and the description of the transaction amount. This credit risk assessment speeds up loan disbursement without any My Account text messages being deleted, read or collected Location Collect and monitor only financial transaction text messages including the name of the transaction party. The purpose is to conduct a credit risk assessment of the transaction and the description of the transaction amount. This credit risk assessment speeds up loan disbursement without any My Account text messages being deleted, read or collected Camera Use a camera to capture documents and/or photos required for the application and assessment process. We upload and transmit the content of the camera to a secure network environment on our server( https://tz.chosenpaysa.com). Collection of mobile phone data Collect and monitor specific information about your device, including name, model, region,language, identifiers, hardware and software information, status, usage habits, unique identifiers (such as IMEI and serial numbers). It is only used to identify your device and to ensure that it cannot be used without your authorization and to prevent fraud. In addition, we will collect a detailed list of your installed applications to assess your borrowing propensity and debt situation, we will upload the collected data to our highly secure server APP NAME ( https://tz.chosenpaysa.com ), Reject Agree and continue

Under Review We are currently verifying your loan details. The results will be available soon. Loan in progress We are processing your loan disbursement, you should receive the fund in 2 hours, Thanks for your patience. The reason for the failure of loan issuance may be that your receiving account information is incorrect or other reason. Please check it and reapply again later. please enter your SMS Code please enter your correct phone number please enter your correct password Illegal verification code Permission Hi there, to access your eligibility and facilitate faster disbursal of your loan, we need these permissions Information Collection and Use For a better experience, when using our services, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information requested will remain on your device and we will not collect it in any way.The app does use third-party services that may collect information that can be used to identify you.
